title: Client lag :/
body: Hello, so i wanna ask u guys for a help, so previous patch 7.21 my client started to lag after i played a match, i though its a bug, so i waited for the next patch 7.22, and nothing changed, when i start a league of legends everything is okay, client working perfectly, but after  1 game, its almost imposible to do smth, i cant choose a normal runes now. :) Any thoughts what can be wrong with the client? :)

replies.body: If it's only the client itself that's lagging, my first suggestion is to try turning on low-spec mode through the client settings. If that doesn't help, let me know and we can try a few different options to try and get the client running smoothly again.

same problem here :/
